00043 #define DEFAULT_PAGE "<html><body><h1>BRisa WebServer!\n</body></html>"
00044 
00045 namespace BrisaCore {
00046 
00055     class BRISA_CORE_EXPORT BrisaWebService  : public QxtWebServiceDirectory
00056     {
00057         Q_OBJECT
00058 
00059     public:
00066         BrisaWebService(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm, QObject *parent = 0) :
00067                 QxtWebServiceDirectory(sm, parent) {}
00068 
00072         ~BrisaWebService() {}
00073 
00074     public slots:
00084         void pageRequestedEvent(QxtWebRequestEvent *event)
00085         {
00086             this->sessionID = event->sessionID;
00087             this->requestID = event->requestID;
00088 
00089             QByteArray requestContent("");
00090             if (event->content) {
00091                 event->content->waitForAllContent();
00092                 requestContent = event->content->readAll();
00093             }
00094             emit genericRequestReceived(event->method,
00095                                         event->headers,
00096                                         requestContent,
00097                                         event->sessionID,
00098                                         event->requestID);
00099             emit genericRequestReceived(this, event->headers, requestContent);
00100 
00101             if (event->method == "GET")
00102                 postEvent(new QxtWebPageEvent(event->sessionID, event->requestID, DEFAULT_PAGE));
00103         }
00104 
00112         void respond(QByteArray response)
00113         {
00114             this->respond(response, this->sessionID, this->requestID);
00115         }
00116 
00125         void respond(const QByteArray &response, const int &sessionId, const int &requestId)
00126         {
00127             this->postEvent(new QxtWebPageEvent(sessionId, requestId, response));
00128         }
00129 
00136         void respond(const QHttpResponseHeader &response)
00137         {
00138             this->respond(response, this->sessionID, this->requestID);
00139         }
00140 
00149         void respond(const QHttpResponseHeader &response, const int &sessionId,
00150                      const int &requestId)
00151         {
00152             QxtWebPageEvent *event = new QxtWebPageEvent(sessionId, requestId, "");
00153 
00154             event->status = response.statusCode();
00155             event->statusMessage = response.reasonPhrase().toAscii();
00156 
00157             // Set key-value pairs from header to event's headers
00158             // it is done because LibQxt's events cannot receive QHttpResponseHeaders
00159             QList<QPair<QString, QString> > headerValues = response.values();
00160             for (QList<QPair<QString, QString> >::iterator i = headerValues.begin();
00161             i != headerValues.end(); ++i) {
00162                 event->headers.insertMulti(i->first, i->second);
00163             }
00164 
00165             this->postEvent(event);
00166         }
00167 
00168     signals:
00178         void genericRequestReceived(const QString &method,
00179                                     const QMultiHash<QString, QString> &headers,
00180                                     const QByteArray &requestContent,
00181                                     int sessionId,
00182                                     int requestId);
00183 
00193         void genericRequestReceived(BrisaWebService *service,
00194                                     QMultiHash<QString, QString>,
00195                                     QString requestContent);
00196 
00197     private:
00198         int sessionID;
00199         int requestID;
00200     };

00211     class BRISA_CORE_EXPORT BrisaWebFile : public QxtAbstractWebService
00212     {
00213         Q_OBJECT
00214 
00215     public:
00223         BrisaWebFile(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm, QString filePath, QObject *parent = 0) :
00224                 QxtAbstractWebService(sm, parent)
00225         {
00226             file = new QFile(filePath);
00227             if (!file->open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text))
00228                 throw "Could not open file for read.";
00229         }
00230 
00234         ~BrisaWebFile()
00235         {
00236             delete file;
00237         }
00238 
00245         void pageRequestedEvent(QxtWebRequestEvent *event)
00246         {
00247             QxtWebPageEvent *c =
00248                     new QxtWebPageEvent(event->sessionID, event->requestID, file->readAll());
00249             c->contentType = "text/xml";
00250             postEvent(c);
00251             file->reset();
00252         }
00253 
00254     private:
00255         QFile *file;
00256     };

00264     class BRISA_CORE_EXPORT BrisaWebStaticContent : public QxtWebSlotService
00265     {
00266         Q_OBJECT
00267 
00268     public:
00276         BrisaWebStaticContent(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm,
00277                               QString content,
00278                               QObject *parent = 0) :
00279         QxtWebSlotService(sm, parent)
00280         {
00281             this->content = new QString(content);
00282         }
00283 
00287         ~BrisaWebStaticContent()
00288         {
00289             delete content;
00290         }
00291 
00292     public slots:
00298         void index(QxtWebRequestEvent *event)
00299         {
00300             postEvent(new QxtWebPageEvent(event->sessionID, event->requestID, content->toUtf8()));
00301         }
00302 
00303     private:
00304         QString *content;
00305     };

00314     class BRISA_CORE_EXPORT BrisaWebServiceProvider : public QxtWebServiceDirectory
00315     {
00316         Q_OBJECT
00317 
00318     public:
00325         BrisaWebServiceProvider(QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sm, QObject *parent) :
00326                 QxtWebServiceDirectory(sm, parent)
00327         {
00328             root = new BrisaWebStaticContent(sm, DEFAULT_PAGE, this);
00329             sessionManager = sm;
00330         }
00331 
00335         ~BrisaWebServiceProvider()
00336         {
00337             delete root;
00338             while (!files.isEmpty())
00339                 delete files.takeFirst();
00340         }
00341 
00348         void addFile(const QString path, QString filePath);
00349 
00356         void addContent(const QString path, QString content);
00360         void pageRequestedEvent(QxtWebRequestEvent *event);
00361 
00362     protected:
00369         void indexRequested(QxtWebRequestEvent *event)
00370         {
00371             //TODO: fix it
00372             root->index(event);
00373         }
00374 
00375     private:
00376         BrisaWebStaticContent *root;
00377         QxtAbstractWebSessionManager *sessionManager;
00378         QList<BrisaWebFile*> files;
00379         QList<BrisaWebStaticContent*> content;
00380     };
